list_definition.mean_english: người chuyên giữ một mục báo
list_definition.definition: a person who writes regular articles for a newspaper

list_ex_of_english: It is not my business to instruct columnists as to the merits of accuracy.
Some widely syndicated columnists get my particular attention.
There are often close personal ties between politicians and columnists, ties which sometimes bring financial and other benefits to the columnists concerned.
If he was ever stopped, the fact that he did not have an identity card would immediately reveal him as a fifth columnist.
Many of the leading papers employ columnists who specialize in sociological commentary.
I would also hate to leave out the nation's humor columnists.
Newspapers may be more likely to promote their columnists, since these voices distinguish these outlets from others news sources.
Why is it that sabbaticals are fashionable only in the newspaper industry, for newspaper columnists to refresh themselves every 10 years or so?
